dao.name: QRY_RVCANCEL_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, cancel_cod, cancel_rmk, flag1_sta, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from rvcancel_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: SEL_RVCANCEL_RF
dao.statement: select cancel_cod as value, cancel_rmk as display, flag1_sta from rvcancel_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and hotel_cod = :hotel_cod
